Translations.Text: Avaru (atithigalu) helidaru; ‘‘hageye aguvudu. (Hagendu) nim'ma odeyanu heliruvanu. Avanu khandita yuktivantanu jnaniyu agiruvanu’’
avaru (ibrahim) kelidaru; dutare, nim'ma guri enu
avaru (malak‌galu) helidaru; ‘‘ondu aparadhi janangadedege nam'mannu kalisalagide’’
‘‘avara mele mannina kallugalannu surisabekendu namage adesisalagide’’
‘‘nim'ma odeyana bali avugalannu (a kallugalannu), atireka esaguvavarigende gurutisidalagide’’
konege navu, allidda visvasigalannu horategedevu
alli (a nadinalli) navu muslimara ondu maneyannu matra kandevu
mattu kathina sikseyannu anjuvavarigagi alli navu ondu pathadayaka sucaneyannu bittiruvevu
mattu musarallu (pathavide). Avarannu navu spastavada adharadondige phir‌aunana kadege kalisidaga
avanu (phir‌aunanu) tanna saktiya gunginalli bandayaveddanu mattu (musarannu) jadugara hagu huccanendu karedanu
navu avanannu avana padegalannu hididevu hagu avarannu kadalige esedu bittevu. Avanu nindanege ar'hanagiddanu
mattu ad janangadallu (pathavide). Navu avara mele ondu maraka candamarutavannu heridevu
adu tanneduru banda pratiyondu vastuvannu koleta muleyantagisi biduttittu
mattu samud janangadallu (pathavide). Ondu nirdista avadhiya tanaka sukha anubhavisiri endu avarodane helaladaga
avaru tam'ma odeyana adesadeduru bandayaveddaru. Konege, avaru noduttiddanteye sidilondu avara meleragitu
konege avaru eddu nillalikku asaktaradaru mattu pratikaravesagalikku asamartharadaru
avariginta hindina nuhara janangadallu (pathavide). Avaru avidheyaragiddaru
navu akasavannu kaiyare nirmisiruvevu. Navu khandita visala samarthya ullavaragiruvevu
Mattu bhumiyannu navu hasinantagisiruvevu. Navantu atyuttamavagi hasuvavaragiruvevu
navu pratiyondu vastuvinindalu eradu bagegalannu (jotegalannu) srstisiruvevu. Nivu patha kaliyabekendu
nivu allahanedege dhavisiri. Nanu avana kadeyinda nim'mannu spastavagi eccarisuvavanagiddene
mattu nivu allahana jote berobbarannu devaragisikollabedi. Nanu avana kadeyinda nim'mannu spastavagi eccarisuvavanagiddene
ide riti, avariginta hindinavaru tam'ma balige bandidda yava dutarannu jadugara athava hucca endu kareyade bittiralilla
avarenu paraspararige idanne bodhisiruvare? Nijavagi avaru vidrohigalagiddare
nivu avarannu kadeganisiri. Nim'ma mele yava dosavu illa
nivu upadesisiri. Khanditavagiyu upadesavu visvasigala palige labhadayakavagiruttade
nanu jinn‌galannu hagu manavarannu nanna aradhanegende srstisiruvenu
nanu avarinda yavude aharavannu bayasuvudilla mattu avaru nanage unisabekendu nanu apeksisuvudilla
khanditavagiyu allahane ellara annadatanu bhari sakti saliyu parama samarthanu agiddane
akramavesagidavarigagi (avara siksegagi), avara sangatigalige niscitavagiddantahade kalavondu niscitavagide. Addarinda avaru atura padadirali
tamage vagdana madalada (punarut'thana) dinavannu dhikkarisidavarige vinasa kadide
tur parvatadane
likhita granthadane
adu tereda putadallide
mattu jana sampanna alayadane
ettaragolisalagiruva capparadane
mattu bhorgareyuva samudradane
nim'ma odeyana sikseyu khandita baralide
adannu tadeya ballavaru yaru illa
akasavu bhikaravagi tallanisuva dina
mattu parvatagalu chidravaguva dina
(satyavannu) tiraskarisidavarige a dina vinasavide
(Indu) avaru mojatagalalli tallinaragiddare
a dina avarannu tallutta narakadedege oyyalaguvudu
(mattu helalaguvudu;) iduve, nivu tiraskarisuttidda narakagni
idenu indrajalave? Athava nimagenu kanisuttillave
idarolage pravesisiri. Nivinnu sahane toridaru sahane toradiddaru nim'ma palige samanavagiruttade. Nimagantu, nivu maduttidda krtyagala pratiphalavannaste nidalaguttide
(andu) dharma nistharu udyanagalalli hagu anugrahadalliruvaru
tamage tam'ma odeyanu nididdaralli santustaragiruvaru. Mattu avarannu avara odeyanu narakada hinseyinda suraksitaragittiruvanu
nivu madidda karmagala phalavagi, (indu) mana tumba unniri mattu kudiyiri (endu avarodane helalaguvudu)
avaru salu salagi dimbugalige oragi viramisuttiruvaru mattu navu visala kannina ‘hur’galannu avara jotegalagisiruvevu

visvasigalagiddavaru mattu visvasigalagi avarannu anusarisida, avara santatigalu – avarannu navu avara santatigalondige serisiruvevu – mattu navu avara karmagalalli enannu kaditagolisalarevu. Pratiyobbanu tanna karmagalige pratiyagi otteyalagiddane
navu hannu hampalugalannu mattu avaru meccuva mansaharavannu avarige odagisuttiruvevu
alli avaru (mojigagi) panapatregalannu eledaduvaru. Yavude anagatyada sambhasaneyagali, papada matagali alli iralaradu
avara sevegagi, suraksita muttugalo embantiruva balakaru avara sutta tirugaduttiruvaru
avaru (svargavasigalu) paraspararannu uddesisi vicarisuvaru
avaru heluvaru; hinde navu nam'mavara naduve bhitaragiddevu
konege, allahanu nam'ma mele daye toridanu mattu nam'mannu narakagniya sikseyinda raksisidanu
Navu i hinde avananne karedu prarthisuttiddevu. Khanditavagiyu avanu maha upakari hagu karunamayiyagiddane
(dutare,) nivu upadesisiri. Nim'ma odeyana anugrahadinda nivu mantrikaru alla, manorogiyu alla
‘‘avanobba kavi. Avanu kalada praharakke tuttaguvudannu kanalu navu kayuttiddeve’’ endu avaru heluttiddareye
nivu heliri; nivu kayuttale iri. Nim'ma jote nanu kadiruttene
avara bud'dhigalu avarige idanne kalisuttiveye? Athava avarenu vidrohigalagi bittiruvare
‘‘avanu idannu (kur‌anannu) tane racisikondiddane’’ endavaru heluttiddareye? Nijavagi avaru nambuttilla
avaru satyavantaragiddare, intaha ondu vacanavannu avaru racisi tarali
avarenu sun'yadinda srstisalpattiruvare athava svatah avaru srstikartaragiruvare
akasagalannu hagu bhumiyannenu avaru srstisiruvare? Nijavagi avarige drdha nambike illa
nim'modeyana bhandaragalenu avara bali iveye? Athava avarenu (nadina) kavalugarare
avara baliyenu eni ideye? Avarenu adara meleri (akasa lokada samacaragalige) kivi goduttiddareye? Hagadare (a riti) kivi goduva avara vyaktiyu spastavada puraveyannu tarali
avanige (allahanige) putriyaru mattu avarige putrare
(dutare,) nivenu avarinda enadaru pratiphalavannu apeksisiruvira mattu avaru taledandada bharadadi naraluttiruvare
athava avara bali, avaru barediduttiruva guptalokada jnanavenadaru ideye
avarenu, yavudadaru sancu huda bayasuttareye? Konege dhikkarigale sancige tuttaguvaru
avarigenu allahana horatu bere devariddaneye? Allahanantu, avaru palugolisuva ellavugalinda muktanagiddane
avaru, akasada ondu tundu muridu biluvudannu kandaru, adu gattiyagidda moda endaste heluvaru
Avaru tam'mannu murche hogisuva dinavannu kanuva tanaka, nivu avarannu bittu bidiri
a dina avara sancu avara yava kelasakku baradu mattu avarige yava neravu sigadu
mattu akramigalige idallade innu heccina sikseyu khandita siguvudu. Adare avaralli heccinavaru tilidilla
(dutare,) nivu nim'ma prabhuvina adesadante sahanasilaragiri. Nivu khandita nam'ma kanna mundiruviri. Nivu eddeluvaga, nim'ma odeyana pavitravannu japisiri
hageye, irulallu, naksatragalu kanmareyaguva veleyu nivu avana pavitravannu japisiri
naksatravu kanmareyaguva samayada ane
nim'ma sangati (dutaru) daritappilla mattu avaru tappu dariyalli nadeyuttilla
avaru tam'ma apekseyinda matanaduvudilla
idu, (kur‌an) – avarige nidalagiruva divya sandesavallade berenalla
idannu avarige saktisaliyagiruvavanu (malak) kalisi kottiruvanu
avanu tumba balisthanu. Avanu (nijarupadalli) munde bandanu
avanu banina ettarada ancinalliddanu
matte avanu hattira bandanu mattu innastu nikatanadanu
konege avanu billina eradu tudigalastu athava adakkinta kadime antaradalliddanu
abalika, avanu (allahanu) tanna dasanige nidabekada sandesavannu nididanu
tanu kandaddu sullendu avara (dutara) manas'su helalilla
niviga, avaru kandaddara kuritu avarodane jagaladuvira
avaru atanannu eradane bariyu kandaru
‘sidratul mun‌taha’da bali
adara baliye ide, svargada visranti nilaya
sidrahvannu enu avarisito adu avarisidaga
drstiyu edavalu illa, mitimiralu illa
khacitavagi avaru tam'ma odeyana kelavu dodda pramanagalannu kandaru
nivu kandira ‘lat’ hagu ‘ujhjha’ galannu
mattu ‘manat’ emba muraneyadondannu
nimage putraru mattu avanige putriyare
Idu tira asamarpaka vitaraneyagide

nijavagi avella kevala nivu mattu nim'ma purvajaru ittu bittiruva kelavu hesarugalu matra. Adara paravagi allahanu yava puraveyannu ilisi kottilla. Avaru kevala tam'ma uheyannu hagu sveccheyannu matrave anusarisuttiddare. Idiga avara balige avara odeyana kadeyinda margadarsanavu bandide
manusyanigenu, avanu bayasiddellavu sikki biduttadeye
nijavagi, antyavu adiyu allahanige seride
akasagalalli adesto ‘malak’galiddare. Avara sipharas'sininda yava labhavu aguvudilla – tanicchisuvavana paravagi allahanu anumati niduva hagu avanu ista paduva munna
paralokadalli nambike illadavaru malak‌galige henmakkala hesarugalanniduttare
avarige a kuritu yava jnanavu illa. Avaru kevala uheyannaste anusarisuttiddare. Mattu uheyu satyakke kincittu paryayavalla
nam'ma upadesadinda mukha tirugisi kondiruvavanannu kadeganisiri – avanu bayasuvudu kevala ihalokada badukannu matra
aduve avara jnanada mitiyagide. Khanditavagiyu nim'ma odeyanu – tanna margadinda dura saridiruvavanu yarembudannu cennagi ballanu mattu saridariyalliruvavanu yarembudannu avanu cennagi ballanu

akasagalalli hagu bhumiyalliruva ellavu allahanige serive. Ketta karmagalannu madidavarige avanu avara karmakkanusaravada pratiphalavannu niduvanu mattu satkarmagalannu madidavarige satphalavannu niduvanu

Avaru (satkarmigalu), sanna putta pramadagala horatu, ella dodda papakrtyagalinda hagu aslila karyagalinda dura uliyuttare. Khanditavagiyu nim'modeyanu visala ksama guna ullavanagiddane. Avanantu, tanu nim'mannu bhumiyinda huttisidagalu, nivu nim'ma tayandira hottegalolage putta makkalagiddagalu nim'mannu cennagi ballanu. Nivu nim'ma pavitrada kuritu koccikollabedi. Dharmanisthanu yarembudannu avanu cennagi ballanu
nivu nodidira, mukha tirugisi kondavanannu
avanu svalpavannu matra (danavagi) kottanu mattu (ulidudannu) tadedittukondanu
avana bali kanada lokada jnanavideye mattu avanu adannu (kanada lokavannu) kanuttiddaneye
avanige tilisalagillave, musara hottagegalalliruva visayavannu
mattu (divyadesagalannu) palisida ibrahimara (samacaravannu)
(paralokadalli) hore horuva yavanu innobbana horeyannu horalaranu
mattu manavanige, avanu sramisidastallade berenu sigadu
mattu avana sramavu (pratiphalada rupadalli) begane kanalu siguvudu
a balika avanige purna pratiphala nidalaguvudu
mattu (ellavu teraluva) antima neleyu nim'ma odeyana kadege ide
khanditavagiyu avane (allahane) nagisuttane mattu alisuttane
mattu avane sayisuttane mattu badukisuttane
avane, gandu mattu hennemba jotegalannu srstisidavanu –
– surisalada viryadinda
punah jivantagolisuva honeyu avana meleye ide
avane, svayattagolisidavanu hagu sampannagolisidavanu
avane ‘si'ara’da (tareya) odeyanu
avane, prathama ‘ad’rannu nasa madidavanu
mattu samudarannu aste. Avanu (avaralli) yarannu ulisalilla
i hinde nuhara janangavannu (avanu nasamadiddanu). Khanditavagiyu avaru tumba akramigalagiddaru hagu vidrohigalagiddaru
Mattu avanu maguci bidda (lut‌ra janangada) nadannu nuccu nuru madidanu
avarisuva vastuvondu adannu (a nadannu) avarisikondittu
(manava,) nininnu ninnodeyana yavella kodugegala kuritu sansayisuve
avaru (dutaru) i hinde eccarisalu bandavara salina, obba eccarisuvavaragiddare
hattira barabekadudu (lokantyada ghalige) hattira bandu bittide
allahana horatu beraru adannu nivarisalararu
nivenu i matina kuritu accari paduttiddira
mattu nivu naguttiri, aluvudilla
nivu bhari doddastike mereyuttiri
innadaru, nivu allahanige sastanga vandisiri mattu avananne aradhisiri
(lokantyada) a ksanavu samipisitu mattu candravu silihoyitu
avaru yavudadaru puraveyannu kandaga mukha tirugisikolluttare mattu idu tira tatkalika jadugarike ennuttare
avaru (satyavannu) tiraskarisidaru mattu sveccheyannu anusarisidaru. Nijavagi, ella visayagaligu ondu kala niscitavagiruttade
khandita, pathadayaka mahitigalu avara balige bandive
paripurna janmeya (upadesavu talupide). Adare eccarisuvavarinda avarigenu labhavagilla
(dutare,) nivu avarannu kadeganisibidiri. (Sighradalle) kareyuvavanobbanu tira apriyavadudara kadege (avarannu) kareyuvanu
aga avara drstigalu taggiruvavu. Avaru cadurida midategalo embante gorigalinda eddu baruvaru
kuguvatanedege avaru dhavisuttiruvaru. Andu dhikkariyu heluvanu; idu tumba kathina dina
avariginta hinde nuh‌ra janangavu (satyavannu) tiraskarisittu. Avaru, nam'ma dasarannu tiraskarisiddaru mattu avarannu huccanendu karedaru hagu avarige bedarike oddidaru
konege avaru (nuharu), nanido sotu hogiddene. Idiga nine pratikara tirisu endu tam'ma odeyanige more ittaru
Navu, dharalavagi suriyuva maleya mulaka akasada bagilugalannu teredubittevu
mattu navu bhumiyinda cilumegalannu harisibittevu. Konege, modale nirdharavagidda ondu karyakkagi niru sangrahavayitu
mattu navu avarannu (nuharannu), halagegalu hagu molegalidda vastuvige (hadagige) hattisidevu
adu nam'ma kanna mundeye (nam'ma kavalinalli) calisuttittu. (Higittu) dhikkarisalpattavana paravagi tirisalada pratikara
mattu navu adannu ondu puraveyagi ulisidevu. Patha kaliyuvavaru yaradaru iddareye
(nodiri,) hegittu nanna sikse hagu eccarike
navu upadesakkagi kur‌anannu saralagolisiruvevu. Yaradaru iddareye, upadesa svikarisuvavaru
ad janangadavaru (satyavannu) tiraskarisiddaru. (Avara visayadallu) hegittu nanna sikse hagu eccarike
ondu asubha dinadandu, navu avara virud'dha pracanda birugaliyannu kalisidevu. Adu bisuttale ittu
adu janarannu, uruli bidda kharjura gidada budagalembante kitteseyuttittu
hegittu, nanna sikse hagu eccarike
upadesakkagi, navu kur‌anannu saralagolisiruvevu. Yaradaru iddareye, upadesa svikarisuvavaru
samud janangadavaru, eccarisuvavarannu tiraskarisidaru
avaru helidaru; navenu, nam'molagina obba manavanannu himbalisabeke? Hage madidare navu darigettavaru hagu huccaragi biduvevu
nam'ma paiki avanige divya bodhaneyannu ilisikodalagideye? Avanantu sullugara hagu tannanne hogaluvavanagiddane
sullugara mattu tannanne hogaluvavanu yarembudu avarige nale tiliyalide
navu avara palige parikseyagi ondu hennonteyannu kalisuvevu (salihare,) nivu avarannu noduttaliri hagu sahanasilaragiri
Mattu nirannu avara naduve hancalagide. Pratiyobbaru niru kudiyuva tam'ma saradiya vele hajarirabeku endu avarige tilisiri (ennalayitu)
avaru (uravaru) tam'ma sangatiyannu karedaru. Avanu atikramakkilidanu hagu avanu (onteyannu) kadidu bittanu
konege, hegittu nanna sikse mattu nanna eccarike (embudannu nodiri)
navu avara mele onde ondu abbarada sidilannu eragisibittevu. Astakke avaru ona hullinantagi bittaru
navu upadesakkagi kur‌anannu saralagolisiruvevu. Upadesa svikarisuvavanu yaradaru iddaneye
lut‌ra janangadavaru, eccarisuvavarannu tiraskarisidaru
navu avara mele kallugalannu surisuva birugaliyannu eragisidevu – lut‌ra maneyavara horatu. Avarannu navu munjavina samayadalle raksisidevu
adu nam'ma vatiyinda (nidalada) kodugeyagittu. Krtajnanadavanannu navu ide riti puraskarisutteve
avaru (lutaru) nam'ma sikseya kuritu avarannu (tam'ma janangadavarannu) eccarisiddaru. Adare avaru a eccarikeya kuritu jagalada todagidaru
mattu avaru, avara (lutara) atithigalannu avarinda kasidukolla bayasidaru. Aga navu avara kannugalannu alisibittevu – saviyiri nanna sikseyannu hagu eccarikeyannu
munjaneye avara mele sasvata sikseyondu eragibittitu
saviyiri nanna sikseyannu hagu eccarikeyannu
navu kur‌anannu upadesakkagi saralagolisiruvevu. Yaradaru iddaneye, upadesa svikarisuvavanu
mattu phir‌aunana janangadavara baligu eccarisuvavaru bandiddaru
avaru nam'ma ella puravegalannu tiraskarisidaru. Konege navu avarannu hididevu. Adu bhari prabalanu balisthanu agiruvavana hiditavagittu
nim'mallina dhikkarigalenu avariginta uttamare? Athava (gatakalada) divya granthagalalli nimagenadaru ksama patra nidalagideye
Navu pratikara tirisaballa (saktisali) padeyagiddeve endu avaru helikolluttiddareye
bahu begane a pade sotu hogalide mattu avaru bennu tirugisi odaliddare
avarige (punarut'thanada) a ksanada vagdana madalagide mattu a ksanavu tumba kathina hagu asahaniyavagiruvudu
khanditavagiyu aparadhigalu darigettiddare hagu sampurna ajnanada sthitiyalliddare
avara mukhagalannu nelakke oragisi avarannu eleyutta narakakke sagisalaguva dina ‘‘saviyiri benkiya uriyannu’’ (endu avarodane helalaguvudu)
navu pratiyondu vastuvannu nirdista pramanadalli srstisiruvevu
mattu nam'ma adesavu kanmucci tereyuvastu ksipravada kevala ondu sucaneyagiruttade
navu nim'ma sahavartigalannu nasa madiruvevu. Yaradaru iddaneye, upadesa svikarisuvavanu
avaru madiddellavu granthagalalli dakhalagide
sanna hagu dodda ella visayagalu likhitavagive
dharmanistharu khandita bhavya totagalalli hagu nadigalalliruvaru
nirmala sthanadalli, sarvasaktanada doreya (allahana) samipa
apara dayalu
(avane) kur‌anannu kalisiruvanu
manusyanannu srstisiruvanu
avanige matanadalu kalisiruvanu
surya mattu candra ondu nirdista sutrakke bad'dhavagive
gidagalu hagu maragalu sastangaveraguttave
avanu akasagalannu ettarisiruvanu hagu samatolanavannu sthapisiruvanu –
– nivu samatolanavannu mirabaradendu
mattu nivu n'yayocitavagi tugiri mattu tukadalli kadita madabedi
mattu avanu bhumiyannu jivigaligagi hasiruvanu
adaralli hannu hampalugalive hagu kavacaviruva kharjuragalive
hottu hagu parimalada puspaviruva dhan'yagalive
higirutta, nivu nim'ma odeyana yavella kodugegalannu allagaleyuviri
Avanu manusyanannu hancinantaha garemannininda srstisiruvanu
mattu avanu jinn‌galannu benkiya jvaleyinda srstisiruvanu
higirutta, nivu nim'ma odeyana yavella kodugegalannu allagaleyuviri
avanu eradu purvagala hagu eradu pascimagala odeyanu
higirutta, nivu nim'ma odeyana yavella kodugegalannu allagaleyuviri
avanu eradu samudragalannu paraspara ondu gudisiruvanu
avugala naduve ondu tere ide. Avu adannu miruvudilla
higirutta, nivu nim'ma odeyana yavella kodugegalannu allagaleyuviri
averadarindalu muttu hagu havalagalu horaduttave
higirutta, nivu nim'modeyana yavella kodugegalannu allagaleyuviri
kadalalli parvatagalante calisuva hadagugala niyantranavu avanige serive
higirutta, nivu nim'modeyana yavella kodugegalannu allagaleyuviri
adaralli (bhumiyalli) iruva ellavu nasavagalide
mattu vaibhavapurna hagu man'yanada nim'ma odeyanu matra uliyuvanu
higirutta, nivu nim'modeyana yavella kodugegalannu allagaleyuviri
akasagalalli hagu bhumiyalliruva pratiyobbaru avanodaneye beduttare. Avanu nityavu sakriyanagiruttane
higirutta, nivu nim'modeyana yavella anugrahagalannu allagaleyuviri
eradu bharagale (manavare hagu jinn‌gale), bahu begane navu nim'matta gamana harisaliddeve
higirutta, nivu nim'modeyana yavella kodugegalannu allagaleyuviri
jinn‌gale mattu manavare, akasagala hagu bhumiya gadigalannu miri hogalu nimage sadhyaviddare miri hogiri. (Allahana) adesavillade miri hogalu nimage sadhyavagadu
higirutta, nim'modeyana yavella kodugegalannu nivu allagaleyuviri
nim'ma mele benkiya jvaleyannu hagu hogeyannu eragisalaguvudu mattu (avugalannu) edurisalu nimage sadhyavagadu
Higirutta, nim'modeyana yavella kodugegalannu nivu allagaleyuviri
mattu akasavu biridu biduvaga, adu benda carmadante kempagi biduvudu
higirutta, nivu nim'modeyana yavella kodugegalannu allagaleyuviri
a dina yava manavanodaneyu yava jinninodaneyu avana papagala kuritu prasnisalaguvudu
higirutta, nivu nim'modeyana yavella kodugegalannu allagaleyuviri
(andu) aparadhigalu tam'ma mukhagalindale gurutisalpaduvaru mattu avarannu (eledoyyalu) avara hane hagu kalugalindale hidiyalaguvudu
higirutta, nivu nim'modeyana yavella kodugegalannu allagaleyuviri
iduve, aparadhigalu allagaleyuttidda naraka
(andu) avaru adara (narakagniya) hagu kudiyuva nirina naduve aledaduttiruvaru
higirutta, nivu nim'modeyana yavella kodugegalannu allagaleyuviri
tannodeyana munde nillalikkide endu anjuttiddavanige (andu) eraderadu totagaliruvavu
higirutta, nivu nim'modeyana yavella kodugegalannu allagaleyuviri
avu dharala sakhegaliruva (totagalagiruvavu)
higirutta, nivu nim'modeyana yavella kodugegalannu allagaleyuviri
avugalalli eraderadu jharigalu hariyuttiruvavu
higirutta, nivu nim'modeyana yavella kodugegalannu allagaleyuviri
avugalalli ella jatiya hannugala eraderadu bagegaliruvavu
higirutta, nivu nim'modeyana yavella kodugegalannu allagaleyuviri
avaru resme hodisida neladalli dimbugalige oragikondiruvaru mattu eradu totagala hannugalu avarige samipavagiruvavu
higirutta, nivu nim'modeyana yavella kodugegalannu allagaleyuviri
avugalalli, drsti taggisiruva striyariruvaru. Ivariginta munna avarannu manavaragali jinn‌galagali muttiralararu
Higirutta, nivu nim'modeyana yavella kodugegalannu allagaleyuviri
avarella manikya hagu havalagalo embantiruvaru
higirutta, nivu nim'modeyana yavella kodugegalannu allagaleyuviri
saujan'yada pratiphala saujan'yavallade mattenu
higirutta, nivu nim'modeyana yavella kodugegalannu allagaleyuviri
averadallade innu eradu totagalive
higirutta, nivu nim'modeyana yavella kodegegalannu allagaleyuviri
hacca hasiru varnadavugalu
higirutta, nivu nim'modeyana yavella kodugegalannu allagaleyuviri
avugalalli utsahadinda ukki hariyuva eradu cilumegalive
higirutta, nivu nim'modeyana yavella kodugegalannu allagaleyuviri
avugalalli, hannu hampalugalu, kharjurada gidagalu hagu dalimbe hannugalive
higirutta, nivu nim'modeyana yavella anugrahagalannu allagaleyuviri
avugalalli susileyarada sundariyariruvaru
higirutta, nivu nim'modeyana yavella kodugegalannu allagaleyuviri
a svarga kan'yeyaru sibiragalalli avitiruvaru
higirutta, nivu nim'modeyana yavella kodugegalannu allagaleyuviri
ivariginta munna avarannu manavaragali jinn‌galagali muttiralararu
higirutta, nivu nim'modeyana yavella kodugegalannu allagaleyuviri
avaru hasiru hodike hagu nunupada dimbugala mele oragiruvaru
higirutta, nivu nim'modeyana yavella kodugegalannu allagaleyuviri
vaibhavapurna hagu gauravanvitanada nim'ma odeyana hesaru samrd'dhidayakavagide
sambhavisabekadudu sambhavisi bittaga
adara sambhava sullagiradu
adu (kelavarannu) kilagisuvudu mattu (kelavarannu) melagisuvudu
bhumiyu tivra kampanadinda tattarisi biduvudu
mattu parvatagalu nuccu nuragi biduvavu
mattu avu dhulagi harada todaguvavu
Mattu nivu muru vargagalaguviri
bala bhagadavaru. Entaha (bhagyavantaru) a balabhagadavaru
mattu eda bhagadavaru. Entaha (bhagyahinaru) a eda bhagadavaru
mattu munde hodavaru mundeye iruvaru
avaru (allahana) samipa vartigalagiruvaru
(avaru) anugrahagalu tumbida udyanagalalliruvaru
(avaralli) heccinavaru hindina kaladavaragiruvaru
mattu kadime mandi anantaradavaragiruvaru
avaru svarnalankrta pithagalalliruvaru
avugalalli dimbugaligoragi eduru baduragiruvaru
sasvata balakaru avara sutta calisuttiruvaru –
– lote hagu hujigalalli sud'dhavada paniyagalannu hottu
adarinda avarige tale novagadu mattu bud'dhiyu mandavagadu
(alli) avara aykeya hannu hampalugaliruvavu
avaru apeksisuva paksiya mansaviruvudu
mattu visala kannina svarga kan'yeyariruvaru
avaru jopanavagi muccitta muttinantiruvaru
(idu) avaru madida karmagala pratiphala
alli avaru yavude anagatya matannagali ketta sambhasaneyannagali kelalararu
‘salam, salam’ (santi, santi) emba haraikeya horatu
mattu bala bhagadavaru, (entaha bhagyavantaru) a bala bhagadavaru
(avariruvalli labhyaviruvavu;) mullillada bugarigalu
gone goneyagiruva bale hannugalu
vyapaka neralu
hariyuva niru
mattu dharala hannu hampalugalu
avu endu mugidu hogalaravu mattu (avugala balakege) yavude adetadeyu iralaradu
(avaru) ettarada asanagalalliruvaru
nave avarannu (svarga kan'yeyarannu) srstisiruvevu
navu avarannu kan'yeyaragisiruvevu
pritipatraragi, sahavayaskaragi madiruvevu –
– balabhagadavarigagi
(avaralli) hindinavaru heccina sankhyeyalliruvaru
mattu mundinavaru heccina sankhyeyalliruvaru
innu edabhagadavaru. (Entaha bhagyahinaru) a edabhagadavaru
Avaru uriyuva gali hagu kudiyuva nirinalliruvaru
karala hogeya neralalliruvaru
adaralli tampu iradu, hitavu iradu
i hinde avaru bhari sukha bhogadalliddaru
maha papa krtyagalalli tallinaragi ud'dhataragiddaru
mattu avaru heluttiddaru; navu sattu mannagi hagu elubugalagi marpatta balika, nam'mannenu matte jivanta golisalaguvude
nam'ma tata muttatandirannu (jivantagolisalaguvude)
heliri; khanditavagiyu hindinavarannu mundinavarannu
ondu nirdista dinada vele ottu serisalaguvudu
a balika o darigetta dhikkarigale, nivu
‘jhakkum’ marada bhagavannu tinnabekaguvudu
adarindale hotte tumbisikollabekaguvudu
adara jotege kudiyuva nirannu kudiyabekaguvudu
bayarida onteyante adannu nivu kudiyuviri
iduve, pratiphalada dina avarige sigaliruva atithya
navu nim'mannu srstisiruvevu. Istagiyu niveke (adannu) angikarisuvudilla
nivu (garbhadolakke) harisi biduva vastuvannu (viryavannu) nivu nodidira
adannu (sisuvagi) srstisuvavaru nivo, athava navu adara srstikartaro
navu nim'ma naduve maranavannu niscayisi bittiruvevu. Mattu navu khandita asaktaralla
– nim'ma badalige nim'mantaha itararannu taruvudakke. Mattu nimage arive illada sthaladalli nim'mannu jivantagolisuvudakke
(nim'ma) prathama jananada kuritu nimage khandita tilidide. Higirutta niveke cintane nadesuvudilla
nivu bittuva vastuvannu nivu nodidira
adannu (a bijavannu, beleyagi) belesuvavaru nivo athava navu adara belegararo
navu bayasidare adannu kevala hottagisi bidaballevu mattu nivu eneno hatasa matugalannadutta uliya bekaguvudu –
– navu sampurnavagi dandanege tuttadevendu
mattu navu sampurna vancitaragi bittevendu
Nivu kudiyuva nirannu nivu nodidira
adannu modagala mulaka surisuvavaru nivo athava surisuvavaru navo
navu bayasidare adannu uppu niragisa ballevu. Istagiyu niveke krtajnaraguvudilla
nivu urisuva benkiyannu nivu nodidira
adara maravannu huttisuvavaru nivo athava huttisuvavaru navo
adannu navu, (narakavannu) nenapisuva sadhanavagisiruvevu mattu prayanikara palige labhadayakavagisiruvevu
niviga nim'ma mahan odeyana hesarina pavitravannu japisiri
nanido, naksatragalu patanavaguva neleya ane hakuttene
nivu artha madikolluvudadare idu nijakku ondu mahan pramanavagide
i kur‌an, khandita gauravanvitavagide
idondu suraksita granthadallide
pavanaralladavaru adannu muttuvudilla
sakala lokagala odeyanu idannu ilisi kottiruvanu
nivenu i sandesavannu kadeganisuttiruvira
mattu nimage nidalagiruva kodugeyannu allagaleyuttiruvira
hagadare, (nim'ma aptana) jivavu koralige muttidaga
aga nivu kevala noduttiruttiri
mattu aga navu atanige, nimaginta samipavirutteve – adare nimage kanisuvudilla
nivu svatantraragiddare, higeke
nivu satyavantaragiddare, adannu (atana atmavannu) maralisiri –
avanu (allahana) aptanagiddare –
(avanigagi) kampu tumbida puspagalu hagu anugraha tumbida svargodyanagalive
innu avanu, balabhagadavanagiddare, –
’’balabhagadavara kadeyinda ninage salam (santi)’’ (endu haraisalaguvudu)
avanu satyavannu tiraskarisi, darigettavanagiddare –
avana atithyakke kudiyuva niru iruvudu
mattu avanannu narakagnige eseyalaguvudu
idu khacita sambhavavagide
(dutare,) nivu nim'ma mahan odeyana namadondige, avana pavitravannu japisiri
Akasagalalli hagu bhumiyalliruva ellavu allahana pavitravannu japisuttive. Avanu prabalanu yuktivantanu agiruvanu
akasagala hagu bhumiya adhipatyavu avanige seride. Avane jivantagolisuvavanu hagu sayisuvavanu mattu avanu ellavannu madalu saktanagiddane
avane adi, avane antya. Avanu vyaktanu haudu, guptanu haudu mattu avanu ellavannu ballavanagiddane

avane, aru dinagalalli akasagalannu mattu bhumiyannu srstisidavanu. Taruvaya visva sinhasanadalli nelesidavanu. Bhumiyolage enella pravesisuttade mattu enella adarinda hora hom'muttadembudannu hagu akasadinda enella ilidu baruttade mattu enella adarolakke eri hoguttade embudannu avane ballanu. Mattu nivu iruvallella avaniddane. Mattu allahanu nivu maduva ellavannu noduttiruttane
akasagala hagu bhumiya adhipatyavu avanige seride. Konege ella visayagalu allahanedege maralalive
avanu irulannu hagalolage ponisuttane mattu hagalannu irulinolage ponisuttane. Avanu manas'sinolagina vicaragalannu ballavanagiddane

nivu allahanalli hagu avana dutaralli nambike idiri mattu avanu nim'mannu yavudara uttaradhikarigalagisiruvano adarinda kharcu madiri. Nim'ma paiki visvasavittu (satkaryakke) kharcu maduvavarige maha pratiphalavide

nimagenagide? Niveke allahanalli nambike iduttilla? Deva dutaru nim'mannu nim'ma odeyanalli nambike ida bekendu amantrisuttiddare. Avanantu (allahanantu) i kuritu nim'minda pramanavannu padediruvanu. Nivu nambuvavaragiddare (idu nimage tilidirabekittu)

Avane, nim'mannu kattalugalinda hora tegedu belakinedege nadesuvudakkagi tanna dasanige bahala spastavada vacanagalannu ilisi koduvavanu. Khanditavagiyu allahanu nim'ma palige vatsalyamayi hagu karunaluvagiddane

nimagenagide? Niveke allahana margadalli kharcu maduvudilla? Akasagala mattu bhumiya antima uttaradhikaravu allahanige seride. Nim'ma paiki, vijayakke munna kharcu madidavaru mattu yud'dhadalli palgondavaru (itararige) samanaralla. Avaru, adara (vijayada) nantara kharcu madidavariginta mattu (vijayada nantara) yudda madidavariginta sthanadalli unnataru. Adare avarellarigu allahanu sresthavadudanne vagdana madiruttane. Mattu allahanu nivu maduva ella krtyagala kuritu arivu ullavanagiddane
yariddane, allahanige srestha salavannu niduvavanu? Konege avanu (allahanu) adannu bahalastu heccisi atanige maralisuvanu mattu atanige udara pratiphalavu sigalide

ondu dina nivu visvasi purusaru mattu visvasi striyarannu kanuviri; avara (visvasada) belaku avara mundeyu avara bala bhagadallu dhavisuttiruvudu. ‘‘Indu nimage, taladalli nadigalu hariyuttiruva svarga totagala subha varte ide’’ (endu avarodane helalaguvudu). Avugalalli avaru sadakala iruvaru. Iduve maha vijayavagide

a dina kapati purusaru mattu kapati striyaru visvasigalodane, ‘‘svalpa nam'ma kadege nodiri, nim'ma belakininda svalpa bhaga namagu sigali’’ endu heluvaru. Aga avarodane, ‘‘nivu nim'ma himbhagakke maraliri – mattu (alli) belakannu hudukiri’’ ennalaguvudu. A balika avara (kapatigala mattu dharma visvasigala) naduve ondu godeyannu nirmisalaguvudu. Adakkondu bagilu iruvudu. Adara olabhagadalli anugrahavu tumbiruvudu mattu hora bhagadalli sikse iruvudu

Avaru (kapatigalu) avarannu (visvasigalannu) kugi karedu, ‘‘navenu nim'ma jotegiralillave?’’ Endu keluvaru. Aga avaru heluvaru; ‘‘khandita iddiri. Adare nivu svatah nim'manne pariksege oddikondiri – mattu nivu kayuttale iddiri hagu nivu sansaya piditaragiddiri. Konege, allahana adesavu bandu biduvavaregu nim'ma husi niriksegalu nim'mannu vancisiduvu mattu vancisuvavanu (saitananu) allahana visayadalli nim'mannu vancisi bittanu’’
indu nim'mindagali dhikkarigalindagali yava pariharavannu svikarisalagadu. Narakave nim'ma neleyagide. Aduve nim'ma aptanagiruvudu. Mattu adu (narakavu) bahala ketta vasasthanavagide

visvasigalu allahanannu nenapisuvudakke mattu avanu ilisi kottiruva satyakkanusaravagi tam'ma manas'sugalalli bhaktiyannu belesikolluvudakke innu samaya bandillave? Avaru tamaginta hinde grantha nidalagiddavarante agadirali. Avarige sakastu dhirgha kalavadhi nidalagittu. Adare avara manas'sugalu kathinavagi bittavu. Mattu avaralli heccinavaru avidheyaragiddaru
nimage tilidirali, allahane bhumiyu satta balika adannu matte jivanta golisuttane. Nivu artha madikollabekendu (i riti) navu nam'ma vacanagalannu nimage vivarisiruvevu
danasila purusaru hagu danasila striyaru mattu allahanige srestha sala nididavarigagi, avanu adannu (avara sampattannu) bahalastu heccisuvanu mattu avarige udara pratiphalavannu niduvanu

allahanalli mattu avana dutaralli nambike ittavaru – avare tam'ma odeyana drstiyalli parama satyavantaru mattu (satyada) saksigalagiruttare. Avarige avara pratiphala hagu divya belaku sigalide. Innu, nam'ma vacanagalannu dhikkarisidavaru mattu tiraskarisidavaru – avare narakavasigalu

Nimage tilidirali, ihalokada badukembudu kevala ata, vinoda, alankara, nim'ma naduvana paraspara jambha mattu santana hagu sampattina spardhe matravagide – male suridaga raitanige tanna bele candaganuvante. A balika adu onagalarambhisuttade mattu nivu noduttiddanteye adu (bele) haladiyaguttade mattu konege curu curagi biduttade. Atta, paralokadalli (ondede) kathina sikseyu ide mattu (innondede) allahana kadeyinda ksame hagu prasannateyu ide. Ihalokada baduku kevala vancaka sadhanavagide

dhavisiri, nim'ma odeyana ksameyedege mattu tanna vaisalyadalli akasa hagu bhumiyantiruva svargadedege. Allahanalli hagu avana dutaralli nambike ittavarigagi adannu sid'dhapadisalagide. Adu allahana anugraha. Adannu avanu tanicchisidavarige dayapalisuttane. Allahanu maha anugrahiyagiddane
bhumiyallagali svatah nim'ma jivadallagali sambhavisuva pratiyondu sankatavu, adu sambhavisuvudakke bahala muncitavagiye ondu granthadalli barediruttade. Allahana palige idu sulabhada kelasavagide

nim'minda kaledu hoda yavudara kuritu nivu koragabaradendu mattu nimage nidalagiruva yavudara kuritu nivu durabhimana padabaradendu (idannu nimage tilisalagide.) Doddastike mereyuva yavude durabhimaniyannu allahanu meccuvudilla

avaru svatah jipunaru janarige jipunateyannu bodhisuvavaru agiruttare. Innu yaradaru (i upadesavannu) kadeganisuvudadare (avanu tilidirali), allahanantu ella agatyagalinda muktanu prasansar'hanu agiddane

Navu nam'ma dutarannu spasta puravegalondige kaluhisiruvevu mattu janaru n'yaya palisabekendu navu avara (dutara) jotege granthavannu hagu takkadiyannu (n'yayada niyamagalannu) ilisiruvevu. Hageye navu ukkannu ilisiruvevu. Adaralli bhari sakti ide mattu janarige halavu prayojanagalive. Mattu yaru kannare kanade tanage mattu tanna dutarige neravaguvarembudannu allahanu ariyabayasuttane. Allahanantu bhari sakti saliyu prabalanu agiddane

(i hinde) navu nuharannu hagu ibrahimarannu kaluhisiddevu. Mattu navu avara santatiyalli pravadigala hagu granthada saraniyannu munduvarisidevu. Avaralli kelavaru saridariyannu padedaru mattu avaralli heccinavaru avidheyaragiddaru

taruvaya navu avara bennige satatavagi nam'ma (itara) dutarannu ravanisidevu mattu avara bennige maryamara putra isarannu kaluhisidevu. Navu avarige injilannu nididevu. Avara anuyayigala manadalli navu saumyate mattu anukampavannu belesidevu. Adare san'yasavannu avare arambhisidaru – navu adannu avara mele kaddayagolisiralilla, allahana meccugegagi (avaru adannu arambhisiddaru) adare avaru adannu nibhayisabekada ritiyalli nibhayisalilla. Avara paiki visvasigalige navu avara pratiphalavannu nidiruvevu. Avaralli heccinavaru avidheyaradaru

visvasigale, allahanige anjiri. Mattu avana dutaralli nambike idiri. Avanu tanna anugrahadinda nimage duppattu pratiphalavannu niduvanu mattu nimage belakannu odagisuvanu. Nivu adaralli (a belakinalli) nadeyuviri. Mattu avanu nimage ksameyannu niduvanu. Allahanu ksamasilanu karunamayiyu agiddane
